ing: 1 (15 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
des: "Tasty, good-for-you soup with a few variations to try!  Either serve as it is, or puree half the solids and return to pot, or puree all the solids.  Serve with parmesan.  Or -- better yet -- top with garlic croutons scattered with parmesan."
ins: In a large saucepan over medium heat, cook garlic in oil 1 minute.  Stir in tomatoes and cook 2 minutes.  Stir in garbanzo beans, water, bouillon cube, rosemary, salt and pepper.  Simmer, covered, 10 minutes.
